short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use with myPresences to submit presences and automatically set data when adding and updating your information online.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The myPresences agent is a companion to the myPresences service which allows you to manage your business's online presence and reputation across more than 2000 online services and apps.

This extension allows you to manage your business presences directly in the browser while interacting with each service.  The extension allows you to:
1. automatically login to services.
2. submit presences to be managed by myPresences.
3. automatically set your business information when adding or updating your profile.
4. See what improvements can be made to your presence while it is open in the browser.
5. If you are an agency or have multiple locations see all of your businesses presences on the service while browsing it.

Plus more.

Install the myPresences Agent to make your presence management effortless.
